name: Umineko Redacted: Some Kind of Sunny Little Dream
name_original: Umineko Redacted: Some Kind of Sunny Little Dream
description:
"Some Kind of Sunny Little Dream"

In a place and time far removed, in a Fragment that should not exist, a minor player takes his first steps onto the stage.

A Forgery for Umineko no Naku Koro Ni (When They Cry). Not an official work. No association with 07th Expansion is claimed or implied.

Features:

  • 6-8 hours of mostly kinetic reading.
  • Several themes and one or two morals.
  • A similar, but distinctly new experience in a different engine from the original, with certain benefits and drawbacks.
  • New art assets, both edited and fresh, some even good.
  • Toggled honorifics and Director Mode.
